localised_text.tooltip_text: Map Marker: General||Use this blue marker for general highlighting and movement orders to your allies.||It can be drawn directly onto the terrain or onto the radar map.
Map Marker: Defensive||Use this green boxed marker to tell allies where to hold their position.||It can be drawn directly onto the terrain or onto the radar map.

localised_text.tooltip_text: Garrison Details||View the composition of this settlement's garrison, a local force that will defend the settlement in battle.
Toggle Strategic Overview||Evaluate campaign progress from a global perspective

alert_icon.componentleveltooltip: You are not currently researching any technologies.

button_grudges.componentleveltooltip: The Great Book of Grudges||Keep track of your grudges against other factions and characters.

dy_intrigue.componentleveltooltip: Influence||Influence is gained during court intrigues, when political events fall in your favour. This is the total amount of [[img:icon_influence]][[/img]]influence available to your faction. It can be spent on further intrigues or recruiting [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lords and [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Heroes with powerful traits.

button_geomantic_web.componentleveltooltip: Geomantic Web||View the state of the geomantic web - links between province capitals that provide provinces with powerful commandments.

button_slaves.componentleveltooltip: Slaves||Manage and view a detailed breakdown of the distribution of [[img:icon_slaves]][[/img]]slaves across all of your provinces.

localised_text.tooltip_text: Army View
Map Marker: Directional/Aggressive||Use this red pointed marker to direct allies on an attack course.||It can be drawn directly onto the terrain or onto the radar map.
Building Browser||View all buildings available in this location.
Building Browser||View all buildings available in the selected horde.

button_diplomacy.componentleveltooltip: Diplomacy||Negotiate with other factions to form treaties or exact demands.

Known Factions

button_offices.componentleveltooltip: Offices||Assign your [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lords to offices, giving them various bonuses.

button_monsters.componentleveltooltip: The Monstrous Arcanum||Track and hunt the world's most fearsome creatures to collect powerful items and place vicious monsters under your command.

dy_time.componentleveltooltip: Marked for Death||There are many who believe that targeted violence is the ultimate method to achieve one's aims, and Alith Anar is no different. Anyone whose demise would benefit Nagarythe may soon find themselves Marked for Death.

localised_text.tooltip_text: Books of Nagash||View the locations and a summary of the nine Books of Nagash.

button_bloodlines.componentleveltooltip: Bloodlines||Awaken powerful [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lords from Bloodlines to acquire powerful factionwide benefits.

button_sotek_sacrifices.componentleveltooltip: Sacrifices to Sotek||Perform rituals to instantly gain Regiments of Renown, Army Abilities, Banners, Followers and other benefits.

button_ikit_workshop.componentleveltooltip: Forbidden Workshop||Use Clan Skryre's Forbidden Workshop to upgrade war machines, weapons teams or produce a stockpile of Doomrockets.

localised_text.tooltip_text: Character Details||View this character's equipment, mount and skills.
Blessed Spawnings||Instantly recruit unique Lizardmen units to your army. Spawnings have stats improved over those of their standard counterparts.

button_nakai_temples.componentleveltooltip: Temples of the Old Ones||View an overview of constructed temples and unlock powerful units and bonuses.

dy_time.componentleveltooltip: Marked for Death||There are many who believe that targeted violence is the ultimate method to achieve one's aims, and Alith Anar is no different. Anyone whose demise would benefit Nagarythe may soon find themselves Marked for Death.

button_shadowy_dealings.componentleveltooltip: Shadowy Dealings||Send characters to carry out actions that advance Eshins agenda and Clan Contracts issued by the four Greater Clans.

button_athel_tamarha_dungeon.componentleveltooltip: Athel Tamarha||Improve your capability to protect Tor Yvresse by upgrading and using this secret citadel's facilities.
